The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. Hotel Catalonia Majorica has a large sun terrace with a poolside bar. The restaurant offers views of Palma Harbour and serves international cuisine. The hotel can be accessed by funicular. Car rental can be arranged at the Catalonia Majorica’s 24-hour reception. Palma’s historic centre and shops are within 2 km.

name: Hotel Joan Miró Museum
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Fons, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Opposite the Marivent Palace and set on Palma’s seafront, Hotel Joan Miró Museum has an outdoor pool and is just 200 metres from the Fundación Pilar i Joan Miró. Each air-conditioned room includes free WiFi and a balcony. This charming hotel will feature original pieces of work from Joan Miró. All rooms come with air-conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. The Hotel Joan Miró Museum's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. There is a modern lounge bar. Hotel Joan Miró Museum has 2 large event areas where guests can hold a variety of events. The accommodation also offers a garage for bicycles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes’ drive away and guests can receive discounts on courses around the island. Porto Pí Shopping Centre is just 3 minutes’ drive away. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is 7 minutes away by car.

name: Hm Balanguera
address: Carrer Balanguera, 37, 07011 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, HM Balanguera provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Lluis Sitjar Stadium. It offers free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a rooftop terrace. This modern hotel provides family facilities, such as highchairs. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a mini bar, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Those staying at HM Balanguera can enjoy the on-site bar, conveniently located for a drink. Room service is also offered during limited hours. HM Balanguera is close to shops, dining and Palma de Mallorca's nightlife. Palma Aquarium is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Hispania
address: Aguamarina, s/n, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Playa de Palma beach in Mallorca, Hotel Hispania offers an outdoor pool, surrounded by gardens, and a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All spacious rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony. Safe is available for an extra charge. For a supplement, guests have access to the spa. Hispania features a buffet restaurant with an outdoor terrace with sea views. The hotel also features a cafeteria with views of the beach, a lounge bar with swimming pool and the Sky Bar, located on the 5th floor, with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. On Playa de Palma guests can enjoy many water sports, including wind surfing and water skiing. Activities such as cycling and horse-riding are also available in the area. Hispania Hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Palma is approximately 10 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Hotel Cort
address: Plaça De Cort, 11, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a roof top with a swimming pool and bar, Hotel Cort is located in Palma de Mallorca, 10 minutes’ walk from Palma Port. The air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Each stylish room features a seating area with a flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe and free toiletries. There is free Wi-Fi available. Hotel Cort is 5 minutes’ walk from a wide variety of shops, lively bars and restaurants and 200 metres from Palma's Cathedral and Plaza Mayor. Intermodal Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive from the property. The property can arrange transport to and from the airport under request and at an extra cost.

name: Be Live Adults Only Marivent
address: Carrer Gavina, 9, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Be Live Adults Only Marivent features outdoor swimming pools and a gym. The relaxation area, available for a surcharge, includes steam baths and a Finnish sauna. It is set on the beachfront of Cala Major. Air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and include a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. WiFi, a safe, and a laundry service are available for an extra charge. Items in the minibar carry a supplement. Set on the beachfront, the hotel has an exclusive beach club, Pelicano Beach. Guests will also find 3 different eating options on site at The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. Central Palma is just 10 minutes’ drive away and tourist information is available at the hotel. Palma Airport is 20 km from Cala Major.

name: Riu Bravo
address: Carrer de la Missio de San Diego, 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Nautic Hotel & Spa
address: C/ Virgilio, 24, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront opposite the Nautic Club Can Pastilla, this modern and minimalist hotel features a spa and an outdoor swimming pool. Nautic Hotel & Spa is near the shops, restaurants and bars of the area. The onsite restaurant serves Mediterranean and international-style cuisine. The hotel is also well-equipped to hold business events and meetings. Nautic Hotel & Spa is located next to the beach in a small town just outside the capital of Majorca, Palma, and is only 2 km from the airport.

name: Bg Caballero
address: Carrer de Neopatria, 3, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated just a short walk from the long, expansive, sandy beach, the Hotel Caballero is well equipped for a fun-filled family holiday in the sunshine and on the beach. This modern hotel boasts an on-site restaurant. Caballero is the ideal place to start your day with a buffet-style breakfast. Then, head down to the nearby beach later on in the morning, lie back on the fine sands and soak up the sun. Stay on site during the day and relax by the swimming pool, take a dip to do some exercise and then grab a drink from the poolside bar. Hotel Caballero welcomes athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle garage. Dine on site in Cabelleros restaurant, where you can sample buffet-style, Mediterranean cuisine with all the family. Free WiFi is available at the lobby and Internet connection via modem is available at an extra cost. A safe can be hired.

name: Be Live Adults Only La Cala Boutique
address: Gavina, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Be Live Adults Only La Cala is set on the beachfront of Cala Major, just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma. This adults-only hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. Rooms at La Cala Boutique Hotel come with an iPod speaker, a Nespresso coffee machine and a safety deposit box. The bright and modern rooms have free WiFi, a minibar with welcome items and a pool towel. The bathroom has a scale, bathrobe and slippers. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and dinner is available at the buffet restaurants. There is also an outdoor bar. Seasonal Masai Restaurant offers lovely views of the sea and boasts its signature cuisine (additional charge). Other services offered include car rental, a tour desk and a laundry service. Guests may use the relaxation area and gym at the hotel next door, for an extra cost. The property also includes the Pelicano Beach Club, open from May to October. A bus stop is located just a few steps from the hotel and buses will take you to the city centre. Palma Airport is 20 km away. When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included. When booking 9 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply. For payments over €1000 it is mandatory to make it by credit card

name: Antiguo Brondo Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms
address: Carrer de Can Brondo 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Attractively located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, Antiguo Brondo Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is situated 5.8 km from Son Vida Golf, 20 km from Golf Santa Ponsa and 200 metres from Passeig del Born Avenue. Plaza Mayor is 400 metres away and Palma Cathedral is 600 metres from the hotel. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near Antiguo Brondo Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms include Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Palma Yacht Club and Palma Port. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Pons
address: C/ Del VI, 8, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hostal Pons is located 250 metres from Palma's port. Set in an old Mallorcan house, it offers a garden, terrace and traditional rooms with free Wi-Fi. The traditional-style rooms feature 19th-century style décor. Bathrooms are private or shared between two rooms. Sheets and towels are included. Several bars and restaurants are within 5 minutes’ walk, as is the Lonja fish market. The Pons is 500 metres from Palma Cathedral and the Almudaina Royal Palace. The Arabic Baths are 10 minutes’ walk away and both Platja de Palma and Cala Major Beaches are 10 minutes’ drive away. Bike rental is available at the house, which is 50 metres from the airport bus stop, Jaime III. Palma Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hotel Pabisa Chico
address: C/ Camino de las Maravillas s/n, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hotel Pabisa Chico provides rooms with air conditioning. Every room comes with a balcony. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At Hotel Pabisa Chico every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ballermann 6, Playa de Palma Beach and Palma Aquarium. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 3 km from Hotel Pabisa Chico.

name: Hotel whala!fun
address: Terral, 23, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located within 2.3 km of Playa Cala Blava and 2.6 km of Sa Pesquera Plana, whala!fun provides rooms in El Arenal. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and international dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. At whala!fun each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Whala!fun offers an outdoor pool. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Calo de Sant Antoni Beach, Playa de Palma Beach and Sa Cova Baixa Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from whala!fun.

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Son Net
address: B-07133937, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This magnificent old country house has been lovingly restored to create a stunning 5-star hotel with luxurious modern accommodation, contrasting beautifully with the historic building with its original features. Parts of the Grand Hotel Grand Hotel Son Net date back to 1672, and great care has been taken to preserve the building’s historic charm while at the same time adding stylish modern accommodation and facilities. The 30-metre outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by individual cabins for private relaxation and the gourmet MAR&DUIX Restaurant adds an extra touch of luxury. The hotel also enjoys a superb setting, surrounded by citrus orchards and lush gardens, overlooking the village of Puigpunyent and the mountains. This luxurious hotel is ideal for a romantic or relaxing break, with a beauty centre offering a selection of relaxing and therapeutic treatments and pampering.

name: Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Costa Brava, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca's Playa de Palma Beach, Grupotel Acapulco Playa - Adults Only is 6 km from Palma Airport. It offers a heated indoor pool, and an outdoor pool with a hot tub, sun loungers and great views. Property is located infront of the beach, first row. Air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and a private balcony, most with sea views. There is a minbar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Acapulco Playa - Adults Only offers a breakfast buffet. Drinks and light snacks are available on the outdoor terrace, which offers good views over the seafront promenade. There is live music in the evenings.

name: Hotel Linda
address: Octavio Augusto, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Linda is 500 metres from the beach of Ca’n Pastilla, in Majorca’s Palma Beach resort. It has an outdoor swimming pool, and free public parking nearby. Rooms at the hotel are spacious and bright. They are all en suite, with air conditioning and TV. WiFi is available for free. The hotel has a bar and a restaurant, serving local and international food. Linda also has a tennis court, pool table and mini golf. Nearby, the centre of Palma Beach offers many shops, restaurants and lively bars. The hotel is located just 2 km from Majorca airport. The capital city, Palma, is 9 km away.

name: Ocho Suites & Kitchen
address: Carrer De La Mar 24, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1.2 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni and 400 metres from the centre, Ocho Suites & Kitchen features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bathrobes. A dishwasher, an oven and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the apartment specialises in French cuisine. Ocho Suites & Kitchen offers a picnic area. Guests can make use of the business centre, arrange day trips at the tour desk or take advantage of the housekeeping service. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Ocho Suites & Kitchen include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grupotel Orient
address: Carrer de la Duna, 3, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Grupotel Orient is set in a quiet area, just 500 metres from Majorca´s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools with sun loungers, a gym and a sauna. The hotel has good access to Palma city centre, and the airport is just 5km away. There are also many shops and bars in the Palma Beach resort. Grupotel Orient has adapted access with ramps. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with en-suite bathrooms. They all have a balcony, a music channel and satellite TV. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves local and international dishes. There is also a lounge bar with terrace. Live entertainment takes place in the evenings. The hotel has internet corner and mini golf. A courtesy room with shower is also available after check-out. Additional facilities are shared with Grupotel Taurus Park hotel, located 25 metres away. Guests have free access to the tennis courts, gym and a spa. The hotel rents bicycles and tennis rackets.

name: Hm Gran Fiesta
address: Carrer Marbella, 28, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located next to Mallorca’s Las Maravillas Beach, Hotel HM Gran Fiesta offers indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and parking is available on site with an extra cost. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony with sea or pool views. Rooms at the HM Gran Fiesta are bright and functional, with cable TV and a fridge. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. A safe is available for an extra cost. The Gran Fiesta’s restaurant serves regional and international dishes. There are also numerous bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk, in the popular Playa de Palma area. Parking is available on site with an extra cost. Palma Airport is just 4 km away and Palma city centre is 9 km away.

name: Palacio Ca Sa Galesa
address: Carrer de Miramar 8, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is set in a 16th-century building in Palma’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Palma Cathedral. It has a roof terrace with great cathedral views. Free bicycle use is offered. Palacio Ca Sa Galesa is 200 metres from Parc del Mar and the sea. The shops and restaurants of Palma’s Old Town are a short walk away. Featuring artwork by Miro, Calder or Bennasar, individually decorated rooms at Ca Sa Galesa offer Old World charm mixed with modern facilities. Each is air-conditioned and features satellite TV, a laptop safe and a hydro-massage bath. There is bathrobes and slippers are also provided. The hotel’s à la carte service offers gourmet dishes 24 hours. A la carte style breakfast is available;

name: Hotel Balear
address: Avenida Bartolome Riutort 18, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Balear Palma is located in Palma de Mallorca and offers free Wi-Fi. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This relaxed hotel offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and a currency exchange. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has a private balcony, a desk and an alarm clock. They each provide heating, a bathtub and a telephone. Guests staying at Balear Palma De Mallorca can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Guests can also try one of the many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Hotel Balear Palma is close to the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Puro Beach and Palma Aquarium, which are within walking distance. Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium is just an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: whala!beach
address: C/ Miramar 1, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Set on Mallorca’s Arenal Beach, 250 metres from Arenal Marina, whala!beach offers a rooftop terrace with beach views and a seasonal outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms include a satellite TV and balcony. Some offer sea or street views and some are interior-facing. All rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Breakfast is available at whala!beach, and there is a buffet restaurant and a bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. There is easy access to the MA19 Main Road and Palma Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Paradiso Garden Hotel
address: Calle Perla 28 - Platja de Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Paradiso Garden is located in a quiet area of Playa de Palma, 200 metres from the beach. The hotel offers free access to the spa offering offering indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath and cabins for massages at an additional cost. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All modern rooms at Paradiso feature air conditioning, heating, and have a private balcony or terrace or garden. They feature satellite TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer. The restaurant offers buffet breakfast, brunch and à la carte dinner. There is an outdoor pool with bar. Bike rental is available for a surcharge. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are 20-minutes’ drive from the hotel. Palma centre is 9 km from Paradiso Garden. Palma Airport is only 5 km away. There is a bus stop located just 50 metres from the hotel that can take you to Palma centre every 10 minutes and to Palma Airport every 30 minutes.

name: Hotel Bordoy Cosmopolitan
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Bordoy Cosmopolitan is situated 500 metres from Palma Beach. Surrounded by palm trees, it offers an outdoor pool a hot tub, free WiFi throughout and a mini-golf course. Balconies can be found in all of the air-conditioned rooms in the Cosmopolitan. Bright and functional, all rooms have a TV and a safe. The gym is well-equipped, and there is special storage for bicycles. Tennis and paddle courts are available for an extra cost. Buffet breakfast and dinner are served in the dining room. It offers a range of Mallorcan and international dishes. The Cosmopolitan is located in a quiet area. A bus stop, offering regular services to Palma de Mallorca can be found less than 5 minutes’ walk away. The airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Purohotel Palma
address: Carrer De Montenegro, 12, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring 2 rooftop terraces, this chic, urban hotel is set in an 18th-century palace in La Lonja district in Palma de Mallorca. There is a resident DJ and open areas, creating a casual and lively atmosphere. Purohotel’s stylish rooms are decorated in neutral tones. It features air conditioning and a spacious bathtroom. Rooms are luxurious and come with 52-inch plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi. A pool is located at Purobeach, 9km from the hotel. Guests can get preferential rates, book poolside sun loungers and the free shuttle to Purobeach from reception. Purohotel Palma offers a small spa with free Turkish bath and sauna. A range of massages can be booked on site. There is a hot tub and a small plunge pool in the rooftop terraces. Purohotel has a roof terrace with city views and the hotel organises DJs sessions at the Bar & Restaurant. The Bar & Restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Purohotel is 200 metres from Palma Cathedral. Jaume III Avenue, with its exclusive shops, is 500 metres from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca’s Old Town and Gothic Quarter are within 10 minutes’ walk.

name: Sercotel Hotel Zurbarán Palma
address: Carrer De Josep Villalonga, 16, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a tranquil residential area, just a short stroll from the old quarter of Palma de Mallorca, Sercotel Sercotel Hotel Zurbarán Palma is a modern and well-equipped hotel – an ideal base for sightseeing in the impressive Majorcan capital. After enjoying a hearty breakfast, take a walk into the city centre, where you can visit Palma de Mallorca’s famous cathedral, and wander around its well-preserved old quarter. The seafront promenade and port area is only 200 metres from the hotel, and is a peaceful area for a stroll. Famous bars and clubs lie within a short walk from the property. Check your emails, or surf the internet at any time in this hotel, which has internet connection.

name: Pure Salt Garonda - Adults Only
address: Carrer de la Mar Negra 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star, adults-only Pure Salt Garonda lies on the seafront at Playa de Palma, 6.5 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Offering sea or garden views, all rooms are large, heated and air-conditioned. They come with a satellite TV, balcony and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. There is a spa with an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Pure Salt Garonda-Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes, it offers a fitness area as well as storage facilities for golf accessories and bicycles. Pure Salt Garonda has 2 restaurants. One is open for breakfast and dinner. The other is located in front of the beach and serves lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a concierge service and computers with internet access are available at reception, subject to an additional charge. The hotel also offers car rental, excursions and currency exchange. A laundry and towel service is available. There is a bus stop only 20 metres from Pure Salt Garonda. Buses to Palma de Mallorca, 9 km away, leave every 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Bordoy Continental Palma
address: Carrer de l'Industria, 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Centrally located, only 10 minutes' walk from the port and Palma de Mallorca's Cathedral, Bordoy Continental Palma is an exceptionally classy hotel, offering smart décor, air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi throughout. The heated rooms at the Bordoy Continental Palma feature an elegant design and flat-screen TV. The spacious, private bathroom comes with free amenities. The Bordoy Continental Palma has a fitness room, hot tub and sauna. There is also a car rental service. In the evening, you can admire the stained-glass ceiling and enjoy a selection of drinks at the bar. The hotel is just a few minutes' walk from the Cathedral and Paseo Marítimo Promenade. Guests can enjoy the shopping on Jaime III street, one of Palma's most important shopping areas, just 100 metres away. Santa Catalina fresh fruit and vegetables market is just 400 metres away.

name: Paradise Beach Music Hotel
address: C/ Sant Bartolome,10 - s'Arenal, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: JS Paradise Sport - Adults Only is 200 metres from El Arenal Beach and Marina. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and 24-hour reception. Free WiFi is provided. Air-conditioned rooms have a balcony and satellite TV. A safe is available for an extra charge. The private bathroom comes with a bath tub and toiletries. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves a variety of dishes. There is a hot tub and sauna. The property also has three different gyms: an outdoor gym, cardio room and weights room. The tour desk provides car and bicycle rental. Luggage storage is offered. There is easy access to the MA19 Main Road and Palma Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Riu Festival
address: Camino de Las Maravillas, n°7, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 300 m from the Playa de Palma, the Hotel Riu Festival was renovated recently to offer you the best amenities during your stay with us. This hotel in Playa de Palma, Mallorca, has spacious facilities where you'll enjoy free WiFi, excellent cuisine, the best entertainment and the exclusive services of RIU Hotels & Resorts. The Hotel Riu Festival has more than 200 rooms equipped with everything you need for maximum comfort. All rooms have air conditioning and heating, a minibar, satellite TV and a balcony, among other amenities. In the facilities of this hotel in Playa de Palma, you'll also find a large outdoor swimming pool where you can relax in lounge chairs in the solarium zone. Plus, you'll be able to enjoy the best refreshments and snacks in the bar in the pool zone. At the Hotel Riu Festival, you'll find the best entertainment thanks to the shows and live music. If you're keen on fitness, around the hotel, you'll be able to practice sports like tennis, horseback riding, golf and various aquatic sports in summertime. The gastronomic offer of the Hotel Riu Festival stands out for its variety. In its main restaurant, you'll enjoy the best buffet breakfasts; the show-cooking stations will delight you, and you'll be able to savour the best vegetarian dishes.FarePortal

name: Hotel Java
address: Carrer de Goleta, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a sauna, Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is located in Palma de Mallorca and offers relaxed accommodation. It is steps from Palma Aquarium, restaurants and nightlife options. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including bicycle rental, billiards and Swimming Pool. Amenities include free wireless internet, massage services and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each day. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is a 10-minute drive from Son Sant Joan Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium by car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Hm Ayron Park
address: C/ Trasimeno, 7, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Conveniently situated overlooking Palma Beach and just a short drive from the airport, this hotel is surrounded by a wide range of tourist facilities in Majorca’s Playa de Palma resort. Spend your day on the golden sands of the nearby beach, just 50 metres away, before cooling off with a dip in the Ayron Park’s 5 swimming pools. In the garden surrounding the pool you can relax in the Mediterranean sunshine. Inside the Ayron Park there is a comfortable lounge and bar. You can also choose to dine at the on-site restaurant, serving a wide selection of buffet dishes. This seasonal hotel is open from February until November.

name: Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Llaut, 24, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 165 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only in Palma de Mallorca, you'll be on the beach, just steps from Playa de Palma and a 4-minute drive from El Arenal Beach. This 4-star hotel is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Port of Palma de Mallorca and 8.5 mi (13.8 km) from Cathedral of Santa Maria of Palma. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Main restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu San Francisco - Adults Only. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Hotel Hsm Reina Del Mar
address: Baleares S/N, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Reina del Mar is 300 metres from El Arenal Beach, in Mallorca’s Playa de Palma. It offers functional rooms with private balconies and free Wi-Fi in public areas. The Reina del Mar features an outdoor swimming pool with a children’s section. The large terrace offers sun loungers and umbrellas, as well as a poolside bar service. The hotel is 11 km from Palma city centre, and regular bus services stop near the hotel. It is also just 6 km from Aqualand, Europe’s largest water park. Hotel Reina del Mar has an air-conditioned restaurant, serving hot and cold buffet meals. The hotel also has a lobby bar, and offers disco music several times a week. Bedrooms at the Reina del Mar are simple and bright, with satellite TV and private bathrooms. Safes can be rented from reception.

name: Regina Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms
address: Calle San Miguel, 77, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Regina Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms features accommodation with free WiFithroughout the property in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, 1.6 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. Boasting a terrace, the guest house is close to several noted attractions, around 1.9 km from Palma Yacht Club, 600 metres from Palma Intermodal Station and 1.1 km from Passeig del Born Avenue. The guest house has family rooms. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Regina Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Palma de Mallorca, like cycling. Palma Port is 3.6 km from Regina Selfcheck-in Smart Rooms, while Son Vida Golf is 6.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the guest house.

name: Abelux
address: Calle Ramon Muntaner, 30, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Abelux offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a 32-inch LED TV with satellite channels. It is situated in a quiet area of Palma, 800 metres from Palma Train Station and Plaza España Square. Rooms at the Abelux have simple, modern décor and wooden furniture. Each room includes a work desk, safe and mini fridge, as well as a private bathroom with a hairdryer and magnifying mirror. Some rooms also have a terrace. A hearty continental breakfast is served in the hotel’s breakfast room. Guests can also relax with a drink in the spacious lobby bar. Free city maps are available from the 24-hour front desk. Staff can book excursions and arrange bicycle or car rental. Typical Mallorcan ensaimada pastries can also be ordered from reception.

name: Hotel Principe
address: Avenida Son Rigo, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 2 minutes’ walk from Palma Beach, Hotel Principe is located in Palma de Mallorca. Offering an outdoor swimming pool, the air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving breakfasts and Mediterranean cuisine. Each room offers a TV and private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in common areas. There is a furnished terrace and a bar available. Guests can access the hotel spa for a supplement. Hotel Principe is a 5-minute walk from a wide variety of restaurants and lively bars. El Arenal and San Antonio de la Playa Ports are within 3 km away. Mallorca Airport is 10 minutes’ drive away and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes by car. Tramuntana National Park is 30 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer De Sant Bartolomeu, 24, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only is just 400 metres from the marina and beach, in Majorca's El Arenal. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. The hotel is just a few metres from the nearest bus stop and Palma Airport is just 6km away. Free public parking is available nearby. The hotel's spa features a Turkish bath, hot tub and foot baths. There is also a range of massages available. Rooms at the Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only are spacious and bright. They all have a balcony, air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel also has elegant lounge areas, as well as a buffet restaurant and a bar. An evening entertainment programme is also offered. Pets are allowed as long as they weigh less than 8 kg. Pet access to the common areas of the bar, pool, dining room and spa is restricted for reasons of hygiene and well-being of our clients. For more information, ask at reception.

name: Hotel Marina & Wellness Spa
address: Paseo De La Playa Sn 1, 07108 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: When you stay at Hotel Marina Soller & Wellness Spa in Soller, you'll be on the beach, just steps from Port de Soller and Playa d'en Repic. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Fil Suites
address: Carrer de la Ferreria 14, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, Fil Suites has well-equipped accommodation in a centuries-old building that once homed a textile factory. It features free WiFi, it is at an 8-minute walk from Palma Port and a 17-minute walk from Palma Yacht Club. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and shower. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher and a microwave. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Fil Suites. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaza Mayor, Palma Cathedral and Passeig del Born Avenue. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 7 km away.

name: Hotel Araxa - Adults Only
address: Pilar Juncosa, 22, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Araxa - Adults only is a 10-minute walk from the seafront and Bellver Castle. Set among green gardens, it features outdoor pool, free gym and spa available spa charges may apply. Large rooms at Hotel Araxa - Adults only are equipped with air conditioning, a TV and free wired internet access. Facilities include safe and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower amenities. Continental breakfasts and a combination of regional specialities from the Balearic Islands with international dishes are served at the on-site restaurant. During the summer months guests can enjoy outdoor dining. The spa includes hot tub, Turkish bath, infrared and steam saunas and massage treatments. Staff at the 24-hour reception of the Hotel Araxa - Adults only can help plan visits and excursions. A small free private parking is available. This property does not accommodate stag, hen parties or similar parties.

name: tent Capi Playa
address: Costa Brava, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in central Playa de Palma, this hotel is just 140 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Some rooms have pool views. The rooms feature tiled floors and plenty of natural light. Each one comes with a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The property offers unlimited brunch from 8:00 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. in the dining room. Staff at reception can provide information about Mallorca, as well as helping with car and bicycle rental. Central Palma is 12 minutes’ drive away, and you can drive to the airport in under 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Amic Gala
address: C/ Xabec Number 5, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Amic Gala is just 70 metres from Playa de Palma Beach in the Can Pastilla resort of Mallorca. Free Wi-Fi is offered in public areas and all rooms have a balcony. Guests have access to the pool and terrace at the Hotel Miraflores, just next door. Can Pastilla has the largest Aquarium in Mallorca and a sailing club. There is a seafront promenade, full of bars and terraces. The Airport is 2.5 kilometres away and Palma de Mallorca is within 8 kilometres. There are direct buses to Palma and the Airport. The hotel offers car and bicycle rental and bicycle storage. The local area is ideal for cycling, tennis, golf and windsurfing. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Hotel Vista Odin
address: C/ Mar De Aral 13, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Playa de Palma, Hotel Vista Odin features a tour desk and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge. The property is located 2.3 km from Palma Aquarium. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms at Hotel Vista Odin include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Hotel Vista Odin offers an outdoor pool. Playa de Palma Beach is 600 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: Terreno Studios
address: Carrer Porras, 3, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 2.2 km from Calo des Grells Beach, Terreno Studios offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. Cala Major Beach is 2.6 km from the aparthotel, while Palma Yacht Club is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 10 km from Terreno Studios.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Vila Damunt
address: Plaça de la Seu 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Vila Damunt features free WiFi throughout the property and views of city in Palma de Mallorca. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 1.1 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms include a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Vila Damunt rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Palma Cathedral. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from Vila Damunt.

name: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden
address: Carrer Del Forn De La Glòria 14, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden is in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca and boasts pools at their large garden and rooftop, within a 4-minute walk of Palma Port. The luxurious suites at Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden feature a seating area and a private bathroom. All have individually-controlled air conditioning. The property has spacious living areas with a fireplace and a library and there is also a restaurant. A la carte restaurant is open every day. The swimming pool is climatized during all year. The property is close to Palma Yacht Club, Passeig del Born Avenue and Palma Cathedral. Plaza Mayor is 600 metres away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca - Adults Only
address: Antas de Ulla,14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 450 metres from El Arenal sandy beach, Indico Rock Hotel Mallorca is an adults-only hotel offering free entrance to live DJ performances and rock concerts hosted by the hotel. A music inspired décor is blended with the latest audiovisual technology to offer guests a rich sensorial experience. Daily musical events take place at the hotel including live-music shows, DJ sessions and video projections. A professional recording studio, meeting rooms and an event centre are available at an extra cost. Indico Rock boasts two swimming pools and two terraces with sun loungers and balinese beds. Guests can have drinks at the pool bar or the Sky bar. Other facilities include a rooftop terrace, a disco. Breakfast and dinner, both, are served buffet style, featuring show cooking. There is a vegan and vegetarian corner. For lunch, guests can order a lá carte Mediterranean dishes. Modern rooms come with air conditioning, a TV with international, radio channels and video on demand, a furnished balcony and a bathroom with a hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box are available upon request and carry a surcharge. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout.

name: Mll Blue Bay
address: C/ Camino Vecinal de Genova-Sant Agusti, No. 30, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, on top of a hill, Blue Bay Hotel is 400 metres from Cala Mayor Beach and shopping area. Set in extensive gardens it offers outdoor pools. All air-conditioned rooms at Blue Bay have a satellite TV and private balcony. There is a private bathroom with a shower. Free internet via modem is available. There is a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. In summer there is a poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested. Entertainment is provided, and there is a children’s play area and a table tennis table. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. You can hire a car, and free parking is available nearby, or private on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Sol Barbados
address: Av. Notario Alemany 7, Calvia Beach, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Magaluf, Sol Barbados offers concierge services, rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and an outdoor pool. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sol Barbados all rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a vegetarian breakfast. Sol Barbados offers a children's playground, children swimming pools, Katmandu Adventures mini club, and a water park called Waterland. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Other services include fitness activities for adults, a bike repair shop, a bike cleaning station, and bike storage. Golf courses can be found nearby. Popular points of interest near Sol Barbados include Aqua land, Nikki Beach Mallorca and The Stage. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Garau
address: Calle Quarter, 9, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located just 150 metres from the beach in El Arenal, Garau Petit Hotel offers bright rooms with either a balcony or a terrace. The hotel has a terrace and free WiFi is provided in public areas. Each air-conditioned room includes a TV, a private bathroom and is decorated with colourful details. You will find several dining options within around 5 minutes’ walk of Garau Petit Hotel. The property can arrange tickets to different theme and water parks. They also offer paddle surf, surf, and kite surf classes. Car and bike rental services are available. Palma de Mallorca city centre is 20 minutes’ drive from Garau Petit Hotel and Palma Airport is just 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: tent Playa de Palma
address: Los Tamarindos, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This pleasant hotel is set 400 metres from the beach in Playa de Palma. Set in pretty gardens, it offers an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with hammocks, 5 minutes’ walk from the resort centre. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at tent Playa de Palma are equipped with satellite TV, private bathroom with bathtub, and terrace. Some also offer pool or Mediterranean Sea views. A safe is available for an extra cost. The buffet restaurant serves unlimited brunch from 8 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. Several bars, restaurants and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk. tent Playa de Palma has a pool, a TV lounge and offers car and bicycle hire. The hotel is located 12 km from central Palma and buses to the capital pass 5 minutes’ walk away. Free public parking is available nearby and Palma Airport is just 10 minutes’ drive away. Please note that to provide more appealing rates while commiting to evironmetal friendly practices, this room doesn't include cleaning service during your stay.

name: Hotel Playa Adults Only
address: Pollacra, 1, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated on the pretty coastline of Playa de Palma and just 5 minutes away from the airport, this hotel is a great spot for a beach getaway. With excellent views of the beaches in the area, guests can relax while exploring the surrounding area. The lively nightlife and beautiful beaches of El Arenal are just a short walk away, while the city of Palma is not far by bus or taxi. The hotel itself is modern and stylish, with a spacious sun terrace, and relaxing TV and lounge area. Most of the rooms come with balcony with seaview. Each room is fitted with standard amenities that guests may need during the stay. The hotel is set in a prime location perfect for cycling fans with stunning seafront promenade. The hotel restaurant offers specialist diets on request as well as sports massages for athletes.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Nura Boreal
address: Mar Jónica, 9, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in Las Maravillas, just 12 minutes’ drive from central Palma de Mallorca. Situated 5 minutes’ walk from the beach, it offers outdoor pools. The air-conditioned rooms at the NURA Boreal feature LCD satellite TV and a private balcony with pool views. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. The Boreal has tennis and padel courts located next to the hotel. You can also play darts, table tennis or billiards. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also many bars and restaurants in Playa de Palma, within a 5-minute walk. The Riu Palace Nightclub is just 1 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is just 8 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Palma Beach Hotel & Apt Adults Only
address: 4 Carrer de la Pollacra, 07610 Can Pastilla, Mallorca
description: Situated in Can Pastilla, 50 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 300 metres from Can Pastilla Beach, PALMA BEACH HOTEL & APT Adults Only features a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. PALMA BEACH HOTEL & APT Adults Only offers a sun terrace. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Cala Estancia Beach is 1.1 km from PALMA BEACH HOTEL & APT Adults Only, while Palma Yacht Club is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 2 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Amic Can Pastilla
address: Carrer D'Oratge, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Just 80 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, this budget hotel offers simple rooms with private bathrooms. Situated in central Can Pastilla, Hotel Amic Can Pastilla is only 3 bus stops from Palma Airport. The Amic Can Pastilla’s basic rooms have bright décor, with tiled floors and wooden furniture. Superior rooms also have a balcony, TV, fridge and hairdryer. Guests at Hotel Amic Can Pastilla can use facilities at the Gala and Miraflores Hotels, located just a 2-minute walk away. These facilities include a restaurant and free Wi-Fi. A range of cafés, shops and lively bars can be found within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Watersports are available on the nearby beach. The historic city of Palma is 8 km away.

name: Calanova Sports Residence
address: Avenida Joan Miró, 327, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, this welcoming residence brings it all within your reach. Thanks to the convenient onsite parking, you can either leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 9-minute walk to Cala Mayor Beach, or easily tackle the quick 4-minute drive to Port of Palma de Mallorca. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the seasonal outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink on the terrace of this residence, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi. This vacation rental features a safe and tour/ticket assistance. Bathroom amenities include towels and slippers.Expedia

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
address: Carretera de Palma-Andraxt, 11, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Ciutat Jardi
address: Illa De Malta 14, 07007 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in a stunning, early 19th-century mansion, this beachfront hotel is surrounded by lovely, tropical gardens. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is less than 15 minutes' drive away. Spend the day relaxing by the outdoor swimming pool in this attractive, colonial-style hotel. Grab a sun lounger and take advantage of the sunshine on the terrace. In the summer months, you can take breakfast on the terrace of Ciutat Jardi, and kick start your day in the warm, morning sunshine. Palma de Mallorca can easily be reached by car, public transport or bicyle.

name: Hotel Iris
address: Amilcar, 3, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Iris has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and is less than 50 metres from Majorca’s Playa de Palma Beach. All rooms have a balcony and private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The Iris has a comfortable lounge with air conditioning. There is free Wi-Fi access throughout. The hotel also has a bar and a seasonal buffet restaurant. Hotel Iris is in the centre of El Arenal, near to many popular restaurants, shops and bars. Palma Airport is 6 km away and Palma city centre is around 12 km away.

name: Hotel Vibra Palma Cactus
address: Carrer d'Acapulco, 26, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Vibra Palma Cactus is 300 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, Mallorca, and just a 5-minute drive from Palma Airport. It offers an outdoor pool and has a garage for bicycles. All air-conditioned rooms feature a private balcony. There is free WiFi, satellite TV and a free safe. There are bus stops near the hotel, offering cheap and quick connections to the airport and the centre of Palma de Mallorca. Hotel Vibra Palma Cactus has a buffet restaurant and there is a café-bar. Hotel Vibra Palma Cactus has a 24-hour front desk, and free on-site parking is available.

name: Es Princep - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1 km from Palma Port, Es Princep features a rooftop terrace, an outdoor pool and spa centre. There is free WiFi. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. A TV is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Palma Yacht Club is 1.4 km from Es Princep, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 550 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Es Princep.

name: Y Hostel - Albergue Juvenil
address: Avinguda de Joan Miró, 126, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Boasting a terrace, Y Hostel - Albergue Juvenil is situated in Palma de Mallorca in the Majorca region, 2.4 km from Cala Major Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a shared lounge, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. Front Desk time it is from 8:00 to 00:00 and the check-in time is from 15:00 to 00:00. At the hostel, the rooms have a patio. All rooms will provide guests with a microwave. Popular points of interest near Y Hostel - Albergue Juvenil include El Garito Cafe, Mallorca Casino and Tito's Mallorca International Club. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 12 km from the accommodation. In the hostel there is an educational project that aims to improve the training of guests with sports and cultural programs among which you can take several bike routes or visit interesting museums. Our recently renovated Y Hostel is a comfortable and cozy Youth Hostel oriented to children and young people travelers, digital nomads and adventurers up to 30 years of age, or older who have the hostel card of the Spanish Hostel Network (REAJ) or any other type of accreditation that is recognized as valid. We thought of everything to ensure you a safe, friendly, fun, connected and convenient stay. Non-members of Hostelling International (HI) must purchase the membership card at the hostel upon arrival. The card costs 10 EUR and is valid for 1 year. Y hostel, it asks that all people must show a covid-19 digital certificate or a negative pcr at check-in License XIJMa/016.

name: Nura Condor
address: Carrer de la Mar Aràbiga, 1, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set within a 5-minute walk of Playa de Palma Beach in Mallorca, NURA Condor features outdoor swimming pool. The air-conditioned hotel has a tennis court and free Wi-Fi. With simple décor, the bright rooms come with a TV and private bathroom including a bathtub. The property offers a garden and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. There is a wide range of restaurants and lively nightclubs within a 5-minute walk of NURA Condor. Palma Aquarium is 2 km away. Palma de Mallorca is 10 km from the property, while Mallorca Airport is 10 minutes’ drive.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma
address: Marbella, 36, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront, Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma is located near nightlife and just 5 minutes' drive from Palma Airport. It features a swimming pool and sun loungers. Free premium high-speed WiFi is available. Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma offers fully equipped rooms, each one with a satellite TV, minibar and private balcony. The hotel offers 2 restaurants, one buffet-style and one á la carte. There is also an on-site bar, Bar Mar Blau, and a poolside bar. Guests will also be able to enjoy the Sensations Spa. There is also a fitness area and 8 golf courses near by. On the rooftop terrace, guest over 16 years of age staying in the Star Prestige rooms have access to an exclusive solarium with an infinity pool and sun loungers. The hotel is set 15 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma.

name: Hostal Alce
address: Parcellas, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located just 150 metres from Las Maravillas Beach in Mallorca’s lively Playa de Palma resort, Hostal Alce features an outdoor swimming pool and a garden with palm trees. All rooms are air conditioned and have an en suite bathroom. There is also a balcony. Hostal Alce offers breakfast in the garden. The hotel’s bar and restaurant with international cuisine, opened 24 hours a day. The hotel is 100 metres from the Riu Palace nightclub. The bars and discos of Beer Street and Ham Street are just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Zhero Hotel Mallorca
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, 6, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Zhero is a chic boutique hotel in the hills overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, 7 km outside Palma de Mallorca. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool with loungers. All air-conditioned rooms at the Zhero Hotel feature stylish, minimalist décor all in white. They come with a flat-screen plasma TV, a private balcony and private bathroom complete with hairdryer. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. À la carte Mediterranean food is available for lunch. The Zhero has a lounge bar with a poolside terrace where you can get a cocktail or a coffee. The pool area is also equipped with ambient lighting and music for parties or other social events. The Hotel Zhero is 5 minutes’ drive from Bendinat Golf Course and 5 minutes from a secluded beach. It is a 10-minute drive to the town of Portals Nous where you can find several restaurants and bars.

name: Nivia Born Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Dels Paraires, 24, 07010 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Ideally set in Palma de Mallorca, Nivia Born Boutique Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Catalan, Danish, German and English, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Nivia Born Boutique Hotel include Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Palma Yacht Club and Palma Port. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Alea
address: Jose Maria Cuadrado, 4, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Alea is located next to Son Veri Forest and 600 metres from the beach in S’Arenal. It offers a 24-hour reception, an outdoor pool and rooms with satellite TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Alea feature parquet floors and simple, modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom and a safe. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. The buffet restaurant offers international food with some typical Mallorcan dishes. You can drive to central Palma de Mallorca in around 15 minutes. The airport is just 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Don Pepe - Adults Only
address: San Cristóbal nº 43, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Don Pepe is located 5 minutes’ walk from S’Arenal Beach and Marina, in Majorca’s Palma Bay. This design hotel offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi in common areas and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The hotel's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a lounge bar which serves snacks throughout the day and has a big screen. Don Pepe Hotel has a games room with board games, and a massage service is available on request. The hotel also offers a tour desk as well as car and bicycle rental services. The Don Pepe Hotel is just 6 km from Majorca Airport. You can drive to Palma city centre in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Amic Miraflores
address: Carrer De Xabec, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Amic Miraflores is a 1-minute walk from Playa de Palma Beach and 2 km from Palma Airport. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and garden. All of the bright rooms at the Amic Miraflores have a private terrace and a bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa de Palma and Can Pastilla are ideal for exercising along the coast. Bicycle and skate rental are both available at the hotel. There is also table tennis on site. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. Guests can also use the bar and dining room at Hotel Gala, just opposite Hotel Amic Miraflores. El Arenal is a 15-minute drive away and has a lively nightlife, with many bars and clubs. Hotel Amic Miraflores is close to the PM-19 Motorway and only 8 km from Palma de Mallorca.

name: Hotel Artmadams
address: Marques De La Senia, 34, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Armadams boasts a superb range of facilities, as well a fantastic location right on Palma de Mallorca's coast, 20 minutes' walk from the city's main attractions. Enjoy the best in comfort at the Armadams, boasting an exciting modern art collection of both paintings and sculptures. The soundproofed rooms are modern, with free WiFi. All guests have free access to the spa, which includes a pool, hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, and showers. The hotel offers breakfast on site. Explore Palma's old quarter, with the Gothic Cathedral, Bellver Castle, Almudaina Palace and Arab Baths all located within short walking distance. Spend the day sunbathing on the beaches located 2 km from the hotel, or go for a swim in the Armadams's outdoor and indoor pools. Pamper yourself at the well-equipped hotel spa, where you can enjoy the sauna or Turkish bath and keep in shape on holiday at the fitness centre. For non-refundable reservations, payment must be made through a link that you will receive in your reservation.

name: Blue Sea Costa Verde
address: Avinguda d'Europa, 33, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Set a 10-minute walk from Arenal Beach, BLUESEA Costa Verde is located in Arenal, on the island of Mallorca. This property features a swimming pool, as well as free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms include a balcony, fan and satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries. Late check-out is available for an extra charge. A safe is available for a supplement. The hotel’s restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and buffet dinner. There is a 24-hour front desk, currency exchange services, shared garden and terrace. The property has a children’s playground. BLUESEA Costa Verde is 300 metres from a shopping centre, and there is a bus stop 100 metres away. El Arenal area has lots of shops and nightlife. The airport is 8 km away, and you can drive to Palma in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Ilusion Calma & Spa
address: Horacio, 5, 07610 Can Pastilla, Mallorca
description: Located 250 metres from Can Pastilla Beach, Hotel Calma offers an outdoor pool, gym and free spa with an indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each bright room has a balcony or terrace. Rooms at Hotel Calma come with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Air conditioning is available in summer. Some of the rooms have views of the pool. The hotel’s restaurant offers international buffet meals, while the poolside bar serves drinks and snacks. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk. You can arrange car or bike hire at the Calma's 24-hour reception, which also offers information about the island. Mallorca Airport is just 2 km away, while central Palma is 8 km away and regular buses stop nearby.

name: Mll Mediterranean Bay Hotel - Adults Only
address: C/ Sant Bartomeu, 18, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Mediterranean Bay is 350 metres from S’Arenal Beach and has an outdoor pool, an outdoor hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Mediterranean Bay has a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. Breakfast in your room is available on request. The hotel’s rooms have elegant, modern design. They all include a private bathroom. The Mediterranean Bay has a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free public parking is available nearby. The Mediterranean Bay Hotel is set in Majorca’s Palma Bay, 11 km from Palma city centre. The area has many shops and bars.

name: Houm Nets
address: Calle Villagarcía de Arosa, 20, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This small, modern hotel is located 200 metres from the beach in Palma de Mallorca. It has an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace. Facilities at Houm Nets include a snack-bar, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Each room at Houm Nets comes with a balcony and air conditioning. They all have an en suite bathroom. Breakfast and dinner are available at the Aparthotel Plaza Son Rigo, next door to the Houm Nets.

name: Urban Hostel Palma Albergue Juvenil
address: Placa De La Verge Del Miracle 4, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Urban Hostel Palma - Albergue Juvenil - Youth Hostel is located in Palma de Mallorca, a 3-minute walk from the seafront promenade. Free WiFi is available. Breakfast is free. All rooms have bunk beds, a wardrobe and a shared bathroom. Guests have access to lockers and locks are available for sale. Towels are available for hire and require a deposit. The hostel has 4 rooms on the first floor, 1 bathroom and a shower inside the female room and another bathroom and shower outside the rooms. The rest of the rooms are on the second floor, they have 6 common showers and two toilets, they also have a small common area (chill out) and finally on the ground floor in the room attached to the reception there will be the common kitchen and two more bathrooms. Tour desk is available. The hostel offers an educational project called 'Mallorca experience'. Palma de Mallorca Cathedral and the marina are within a 20-minute walk. Cala Major Beach is 4 km away. Mallorca's Sant Joan Airport is 10 km from Urban Hostel Palma - Albergue Juvenil - Youth Hostel.

name: Nobis Hotel Palma, a Member of Design Hotels
address: Carrer De La Caputxines 9, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Saulo Beach Hotel
address: Avenida Bartomeu Riutort, 51, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the beach of Playa de Palma, Saulo Beach Hotel is located on the edge of Can Pastilla, near Palma de Mallorca, the capital of Majorca. Stroll down to the beach from Saulo Beach Hotel and relax on the fine sands. You can take a dip in the Mediterranean Sea here, or hire a bike and ride along the seafront promenade. You can enjoy lunch and dinner at the Sauló’s onsite à la carte restaurant, or grab a snack in the café, which has a terrace opening out onto the beach. From here you can easily and quickly get to the centre of Palma by bus – the bus stop is located near the hotel. Palma airport is also just a short journey from Saulo Beach Hotel. Seasonal hotel - Open from 15 January until November.

name: Belle Marivent Mediterranean Petit Hotel
address: Avinguda de Joan Miró 250, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Occidental Playa de Palma
address: Avinguda Del Fra Joan Llabres 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Playa de Palma before called Barcelo Pueblo Park is situated right in the centre of the Playa de Palma de Mallorca an ideal spot for enjoying a peaceful holiday on the Playa El Arenal which is situated only 200m from the hotel. In the surrounding area of the hotel you will be able to go cycling diving hiking and play golf. There is a choice of 5 golf courses close by within a 20 km radius of the hotel. Barcelo Pueblo Park Hotel also has one of the best equipped cycling centres on the island which offers the expertise and experience of Max Huerzeler Bicycle Holidays. It is the perfect hotel for sports lovers. It also offers its customers a Health and Wellness Centre with sauna Turkish bath indoor heated swimming pool and massage service. In addition the hotel has modern rooms for conventions or company meetings and offers Wi-Fi connection in the commong areas. The Occidental Playa de Palma hotel has been awarded the Tourist Quality Q distinction.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Nakar Hotel
address: Avenida Jaime III, 21, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca, 300 metres from Palma Port, Nakar Hotel features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. This modern and stylish hotel is set in the shopping area of Jaime III Avenue. The airport is just 10 km away. Public parking is available nearby for an extra cost. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A balcony or patio are featured in certain rooms. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. name: Can Rei Des Pla
address: Ponent
description: Located in Génova, near Palma de Mallorca and the Bellver Castle, this beautiful house welcomes 8 people. The beautiful outside of the house is adorned with flowers and gives a Mediterranean impression to the house. The large terrace is ideal for long dinners in open air with the whole family. Maybe you fancy a tasty barbecue under the sky full of stars at night? Both children and adults will enjoy playing exciting table tennis tournaments. In the evening you can sunbath on one of the seven sunbeds. This cozy house is in the village and there are some direct neighbors around the house. In the comfortable living room you can eat with your family, watch satellite TV or read your favorite book by the wood stove. The decoration is typical Majorcan and the highlights are the original tiles of the room. In the kitchen with a gas stove you can find everything you need to prepare any dish. Aswell, there is a laundryroom with washing machine, iron and ironing board. On the ground floor there is a bedroom with double bed and a bathroom with shower. Upstairs,you will find three bedrooms with single beds, one of them with their own bathroom with bath, and one with double bed and private bathroom with shower, invite to rest. All of the bedrooms have fans and lockers to store your belongings. The bedroom with double bed and the bedroom with twin beds have a connecting door, but at the same time each has a separate entrance. Six fans complete the equipment. The town of Génova is a neighborhood that belongs to the Ponent district, just outside the capital Palma de Mallorca. In the center you will find everything you need for an independent stay. If you like the Majorcan kitchen, there are many family restaurants serving good home cooking in Genova. More or less 15 minutes drive separate you from Palma de Mallorca. The Pearl of the Mediterranean is famous for its cathedral La Seu, Bellver Castle, the picturesque old town, the international fashion shops, the promenade with nightclubs and tapas bars. The next sandy beach, Cala Major, is roughly 3.5 kilometers away but with a few minutes drive you reach other sandy coves; including Illetes, Portals Nous and Palmanova. In this area you find several amusement parks; for example Marineland and forest acrobatic course Jungle Parc Junior. It is a five minutes drive to reach the golf course of the Arabella Golf Bendinat. Note: We cannot accept guests under 27 years unless you are a family. We need copies of the passports of all guests in order to accept the booking. Consult the advertiser for possible charges. Pets are not allowed. The holding of events is forbidden. Distances Beach: 3.6 km - Cala Major Airport: 20 km - Son Sant Joan Golf course: 6.1 km - Real Golf Bendinat Town: 0.100 km - Genova Train station: 13 km - Estació Intermodal de Palma Bus stop: 0.300 km - Camí dels Reis, Genova Ferry: 15 km - Port de Palma Hospital: 17 km - Son Espasses Tourist license: ETV/6027 There's a mandatory tourist tax in Balearic Islands, called Ecotasa. All guests, except people under 16 years, have to pay this tax. The amount varies between 0.55€/night and guest during the low season and 2.2€/night and guest during the high season.The tax is reduced by half from the 9th day for your stay. Final Cleaning (01 January(2022) to 01 January(2026) ): (354€/Stay) (mandatory) Please, do not mark babies ( from 0 to 2 years old) as children. Guests between the ages of 2 and 15 are considered children. Guests who are 16 years old are considered adults. Free WifiExpedia
