address: Ponent
description: This beautiful villa, located in a privileged area of Palma, welcomes 8 people. The bucolic exteriors of this villa have two furnished terraces with views of the sea and the mountains, perfect for a drink while enjoying the evening or sunbathing. In addition, there is a garden with fruit trees and a barbecue where you can prepare wonderful dishes. The property is fenced and there are neighbours nearby. The elegant interior of the two-storey colonial-style house has been renovated and adapted to our times. On the ground floor you will find the spacious living room, equipped with Smart TV, and a dining area with a large table where you can gather to enjoy wonderful meals with your companions. The kitchen is independent and is equipped with everything you need to cook in total comfort. There is a washing machine, dryer, iron and ironing board in the house. On this floor you will also find a double bedroom with access to the terrace, as well as a toilet and a bathroom with shower. On the upper floor are the other three bedrooms. Two of them have two single beds and one of them also has access to the terrace. The last bedroom has a double bed and an en suite bathroom with bathtub. There are 6 fans and 6 radiators at your disposal. If you are travelling with your baby, we can provide you with a cot and a highchair. This house is located in the neighbourhood of El Terreno in Palma, a quiet and privileged place due to its location near the sea and places of interest such as the Bellver Castle. Moreover, the island's capital is a great treasure to be discovered. If you approach the centre, which is very close, you will find not only exclusive shops and luxury boutiques, but also a wide variety of museums and art galleries, including Es Baluard, located in the Santa Catalina district and with impressive views of the old Lonja, the Almudaina palace and, of course, the cathedral. We also encourage you to wander through the streets of the historic centre and the old Jewish quarter, full of charming little corners and typical Mallorcan houses. If you fancy a swim, the area of Es Molinar and the beach of Can Pere Antoni are close to your accommodation. The driveway is 1.6 metres high, so please bear this in mind if you bring your own car. Note: We cannot accept guests under 30 years unless you are a family. We need copies of the passports of all guests in order to accept the booking. Consult the advertiser for possible charges. Pets are not allowed. The holding of events is forbidden. There are parking space for 1 cars in the garage. Distances Beach: 4.3 km - Can Pere Antoni Airport: 12.4 km - Palma de Mallorca Golf course: 6 km - Golf Son Vida Town: 3.2 km - Palma Train station: 3.5 km - Estació Intermodal Bus stop: 0.35 km - Plaza Gomila Ferry: 3.2 km - Palma Hospital: 2.1 km - Clínica Juaneda Tourist license: ETV/9456 There's a mandatory tourist tax in Balearic Islands, called Ecotasa. All guests, except people under 16 years, have to pay this tax. The amount varies between 0.55€/night and guest during the low season and 2.2€/night and guest during the high season.The tax is reduced by half from the 9th day for your stay. Please, do not mark babies ( from 0 to 2 years old) as children. Guests between the ages of 2 and 15 are considered children. Guests who are 16 years old are considered adults. Free WifiExpedia

name: Beetroot
address: 9 Avinguda Europa, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Set in Llucmajor, less than 1 km from Calo de Sant Antoni Beach, Beetroot offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. Located around 1.2 km from Sa Cova Baixa Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.2 km away from Playa de Palma Beach. Palma Yacht Club is 17 km away and Palma Port is 17 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms come with a balcony. The units at Beetroot come with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Son Vida Golf is 23 km from the accommodation, while Golf Santa Ponsa is 35 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Beetroot.

name: EssoEss Boat - Five Star - Exclusive use
address: Centre
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, 1.4 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni and 1.5 km from Palma Port, EssoEss Boat - Five Star - Exclusive use offers free WiFi, a terrace and air conditioning. The property features sea and city views, and is less than 1 km from Palma Yacht Club. This boat comes with 4 bedrooms, a kitchenette with fridge, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 4 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the boat. A continental breakfast is available daily at the boat. Staff at EssoEss Boat - Five Star - Exclusive use are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. A bicycle rental service is available at the accommodation, while snorkelling and cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near EssoEss Boat - Five Star - Exclusive use include Passeig del Born Avenue, Plaza Mayor and Palma Cathedral. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 7 km from the boat, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.
